name: Dingo World
description:
Game Description

Dingo the protagonist of the game, walking through the forest carrying food for his family and get a peculiar box, only to pick it up, this opens a portal absorbing Dingo, while being transported he hears a voice of an old sorcerer saying "Welcome to the test If you want to escape you have to get the diamonds to get out ... However, I wont make it easy ha ha ha ha! ". Dingo awakens in a timeless place where there are floating grounds and obstacles summoned with the magic of the fearsome and mysterious sorcerer. It's time to test your reflexes, coordination and decision making to save Dingo and he can return home with the food he was expected to bring.
